alert.note: Alert for Clallam (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued August 21 at 10:15AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... An Air Quality Alert for Smoke has been issued by the following agencies: Olympic Region Clean Air Agency until 5 PM PDT this afternoon. The air quality is expected to be unhealthy for sensitive groups. Health Impacts and Recommended Actions: When air quality is Unhealthy, everyone should take steps to reduce exposure. Limit time outside, avoid strenuous outdoor activity, and follow tips for cleaner indoor air. Stay cool and hydrated in the excessive heat. When air quality is Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups, sensitive groups should take steps to reduce exposure. Limit time outside, avoid strenuous outdoor activity, and follow tips for cleaner indoor air. Everyone should watch for symptoms as a sign to reduce exposure. For current air quality conditions and additional information visit your local air quality agency at www.orcaa.org, www.nwcleanairwa.gov, www.pscleanair.gov, and swcleanair.gov.
